name: Pit-Stop
description:
Manage a racecar pit crew in this prototype Strategy-Racing hybrid. Send your pit crew to gather Metal and Oil so that they have the resources they need to repair and refuel your team's car when you schedule a pitstop.

Controls

  • WASD - Move the camera in strategy mode.
  • Mouse Wheel - Zoom camera in strategy mode.
  • Space - Toggle between strategy and chase cameras.
  • Enter - Schedule/cancel a pitstop for your racecar.
